discover.instruction: Read the speech. Notice how key points are emphasized.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай речь. Обрати внимание, как выделяются ключевые моменты.

content.text: <highlight>What we need</highlight> is action, not words. <highlight>It was you who</highlight> made this possible. <highlight>The thing that concerns me most</highlight> is the deadline. <highlight>Do</highlight> remember to submit on time. I <highlight>did</highlight> warn you about this! <highlight>This</highlight> is exactly what I meant. <highlight>Such</highlight> dedication deserves recognition. <highlight>So moved was I</highlight> that I couldn't speak. <highlight>All I ask</highlight> is your best effort. <highlight>Little did we know</highlight> how hard it would be.
content.question: What different techniques are used to add emphasis?
content.question_ru: Какие разные техники используются для добавления акцента?

points.rule: Cleft sentences: What...is..., It is/was...that/who..., The thing that...
points.rule_ru: Эмфатические расщеплённые: What...is..., It is/was...that/who..., The thing that...
points.example: What I need is help. It was John who called.
I do understand. She does care. They did try.

points.rule: Inversion: Never have I..., Rarely does..., Not only...but also
points.rule_ru: Инверсия: Never have I..., Rarely does..., Not only...but also
points.example: Never have I seen such beauty. Not only did she win, but she also set a record.
This I cannot accept. Brilliant, she was!

points.rule: Emphatic reflexives: myself, yourself, etc. after noun/pronoun
points.rule_ru: Эмфатические возвратные: myself, yourself и т.д. после сущ./местоимения
points.example: I myself don't believe it. The president himself apologized.

comparison_table.example: It was she who told me.
Never have I felt so happy.

notice.instruction: Identify the emphasis structure and what is being emphasized.
notice.instruction_ru: Определи структуру усиления и что именно выделяется.

tasks.text:
From a motivational speech:

1. What you believe, you can achieve.
2. It was determination that brought me here.
3. I do believe in hard work.
4. Never have I given up on my dreams.
5. This success I share with all of you.
6. She herself overcame incredible obstacles.
7. Not only did she succeed, but she also inspired millions.
8. The one thing I ask is your commitment.
9. Such persistence is rare these days.
10. All I wanted was a chance.

produce.instruction: Write a persuasive text or speech using various emphasis structures.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши убедительный текст или речь, используя различные структуры усиления.
prompts: Argue for something you believe in
Write about someone who inspires you
Make a persuasive case for a change
produce.example: What we need today is courage. Never before have we faced such challenges. It is unity that will see us through. I do believe we can overcome this. Not only must we act, but we must also inspire others. The one thing I ask is your commitment. This responsibility we all share together. She herself showed us what's possible. Such determination is what changes the world. All I want is for us to try. What matters most is not whether we fail, but whether we get up again.

texts.title: Graduation Speech
texts.content: What you've achieved today is remarkable. Never have I been prouder of a graduating class. It was hard work that brought you here. I do remember my own graduation. Not only have you succeeded academically, but you've also grown as people. The one thing I ask is that you stay curious. This moment you've earned yourselves. Such determination deserves celebration. All I want is for you to believe in yourselves. What matters now is your next step.

texts.title: Award Acceptance
texts.content: What I feel right now is overwhelming gratitude. It was my team who made this possible. Never did I imagine standing here. I do appreciate every vote of confidence. Not only did you believe in me, but you also gave me opportunities. This award I accept on behalf of everyone who helped. The one person I must thank is my mentor. She herself never sought recognition. Such generosity is rare. All she wanted was to see others succeed.

texts.title: Political Speech
texts.content: What this country needs is leadership. Never have the stakes been higher. It is action that we demand. We do understand the challenges. Not only must we reform the system, but we must also heal divisions. This responsibility we embrace fully. The one promise I make is transparency. We ourselves will be held accountable. Such trust must be earned. All we ask is a chance to prove ourselves. What happens next depends on all of us.

texts.title: Product Launch
texts.content: What we're unveiling today will change everything. Never before has technology been so accessible. It was customer feedback that shaped this design. We do listen to our users. Not only is it powerful, but it's also affordable. This innovation I'm proud to present. The one feature I love most is the simplicity. Our engineers themselves couldn't believe how well it works. Such dedication went into every detail. All we wanted was to make your life easier.

texts.title: Personal Story
texts.content: What I learned from failure changed my life. Never did I think I'd be grateful for rejection. It was those setbacks that taught me resilience. I do believe everything happens for a reason. Not only did I survive, but I also thrived. This journey I wouldn't trade for anything. The one person who believed in me was my grandmother. She herself faced incredible hardship. Such wisdom she shared with me. All she asked was that I never give up.
